name: Loop Wars
description:
Loop Wars is a game where you try to survive as much as you can to get the biggest score. There is also an Facebook Version in the following url: https://apps.facebook.com/loopwars.

 

Instructions:

Try to dodge and shoot the enemies that appears in the loop, the more enemies you destroy the more points you will get.

Move with A/S/D/W or the Arrow Keys.

Fire with space, z, l or left mouse.
